structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Promulgation of administrative regulations by board.

text.section: The CMRS Board shall implement the provisions of KRS 65.7621 to 65.7643 through the promulgation of administrative regulations in accordance with the provisions of KRS Chapter 13A.

law.history: Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 219, sec. 6, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 535, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1998.
